name: Koncave Falls
description: The waterfall is surrounded on all sides by a giant root system. Strange, humanlike creatures dart into the darkness as you approach. There are a number of sparkling rocks jutting out from the roots that cling to the roof of the cavern.

unlockableAreas.buttonText: Climb the vines to reach the rocks

name: Koncave Falls Mine
description: The mine hangs above the giant root system. Even more strange creatures appear to be hiding in the shadows. You can just barely reach the sparkling rocks jutting out from the roots that cling to the roof of the cavern.

name: Koncave City Gate
description: Two guards stand watch at the front of a massive gate. You'll have to pass through to continue. Off to the side you see a path leads around the castle wall.

name: Koncave City Square
description: A large fountain fuelled by a waterfall coming out of the roof of the cavern stands in the middle of the square. Shops surround the perimeter, and a castle resides on the far side.

buildings.name: Jason's Jewelry
buildings.description: A rather shady individual sits at a stool in the corner of the shop, glaring at everyone who comes in. There isn't much here aside from necklaces. Everything here is very expensive.

buildings.name: Alchemiscellanea
buildings.description: Here and there roots penetrate the roof of this incredibly old building. The walls are decorated with a strange kind of artwork you've never seen before. There is no light source in the room, but somehow you can still see everything that is for sale.

name: Koncave City Backstreets
description: The back alleys of Koncave City are damp and dirty. The great sources of light that illuminate the city square are obscured by crumbling walls and ancient passageways. Here and there is appears there are shops that are still operating, despite the conditions.

buildings.name: Koncave Extractors
buildings.description: You enter a dingy room. A single candle lights the space, which is filled with a terrible stench that you can't find the source of. A man with a strange mask is sitting behind a counter and waves in a friendly manner to you as you walk in.
